name: 曾傳蘆
objective:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括四大項：
一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換
二 向量幾何與分析
三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。
四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
上學期課程包含第一大項，下學期課程包括第二、三、四項。
schedule:
第一週
First Order Differential Equations: Preliminary Concepts
第二週
Separable Equations & Linear Differential Equations
第三週
Exact Differential Equations & Integrating Factors
第四週
Homogeneous, Bernoulli, and Reccati Equations
 Applications of Electrical Circuits
第五週
Second Order Differential Equations: Preliminary Concepts
第六週
Theory of Solutions & Reduction of Order
第七週
The Constant Coefficient Homogeneous Linear Equations
 Euler Equations
第八週
The Nonhomogeneous Equation
第九週
期中考
Application of Second Order Differential Equations
第十週
The Laplace Transform & Definition and Properties
第十一週
Solution of Initial Value Problems
第十二週
Shifting Theorems & Convolution Theorem
Unit Impulses and The Dirac Delta Function
第十三週
Laplace Transform Solution of Systems
第十四週
Differential Equations with Polynomial Coefficients
第十五週
Series Solution
Initial Value Problems
第十六週
Using Recurrence Relations
第十七週
Singular points and the Method of Frobenius
Second Solutions and Logarithm Factors
第十八週
期末考
materials:
Textbook: Advanced Engineering Mathematics
Peter V. O'Neil, 8th ed.
